SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rtc_user (username, password, salt, status, create_dt, update_dt, remark) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update rtc_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_dt = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dt = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, salt, status, create_dt, update_dt, remark from rtc_user
